name: Tristan & Sabrina Truscott
what_you_do: Tristan and Sabrina Truscott are dedicated to helping individuals achieve vibrant health, well-being, and happiness through their energy method, the Satori Method, which empowers people to harness their life-force energy.
who_you_serve: They serve individuals seeking healing and personal growth, particularly those interested in energy healing and holistic wellness.
business_focus: Tristan and Sabrina Truscott are dedicated to helping individuals achieve vibrant health, well-being, and happiness through their energy method, the Satori Method, which empowers people to harness their life-force energy. (energy healing)
